City Council Meetings

Regular City Council meetings are scheduled for 7 pm on the 3rd Tuesday of the month at Talty City Hall- **9700 CR 213, Talty TX 75126**

**No meeting will be held October 21st due to the lack of necessary action items.**

Welcome to Talty  


---

![home](https://www.taltytexas.com/upload/template/0028/images/home.jpg)We are a small community only 25 miles east of Downtown Dallas. Located south of Forney on I-20, we currently have developments offering one acre residential lots. We welcome those interested in commercial and residential properties to contact us about developing available parcels in a manner compatible with our community's vision.
